attributes.action: Are 4 wheel drive vehicles necessary for normal road conditions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why do women have to use a  large 4 x 4 vehicle to take their children half a mile down the road to school, park half on the foot path causing a danger to pedestrians then spend the rest of the day driving around whilst using their mobile phones. Surely they could use a small hatchback vehicle to do this or would their egos or status not allow them. Seriously 'DO YOU NEED A 4X4 VEHICLE TO DO THIS' ANSWER NO

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
